title.rendered: Florida Sports Betting 2023 – What’s next for Florida?

content.rendered:
by Arthur Reyes

Florida sports betting has been in the news after being halted and kept in limbo for almost 2 years before the DC Court of Appeals on June 30th overturned a district court decision blocking sports betting in the Sunshine State. However, on August 14th, a petition was filed for a rehearing to block the launch. Nonetheless, a chance remains that sports betting in Florida will be relaunched prior to the NFL kickoff on September 7th.

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any game this week! You can grab that offer here!

Florida is the third most populous state in the United States with close to 22 million people and sports fans across the state are eagerly awaiting positive news on Sports gambling. If sports betting online in Florida returns there are multiple ways in which sports bettors in the state can place a wager on their favorite team or player.

Most states held discussions in public legislative hearings, while Florida’s discussions were almost entirely behind closed doors. Any sports betting deal in Florida required long-term negotiating between the Seminole tribe and the state.

As of August 22nd, it was announced that the launch of Florida’s Hard Rock Bet in time for the start of the NFL season on September 7th was once again in doubt because of a district court of appeals request regarding a petition filed by West Flagler Associates.

Two weeks ago, Charles Upton, who became the chairperson of the Florida Gaming Control Commission less than 5 months ago, resigned. This mark’s the third time in less than 2 years the position is vacant.

Hard Rock Bet’s app is not available in Florida because of the latest legal procedures taking place. Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, Florida, which is operated by the Seminole Tribe, is the most recognized brand. The Seminole tribe enjoys exclusivity in Florida when it comes to sports betting and therefore Hard Rock Bet was the foremost amongst the options presented.

How will your favorite Florida team fare in Week 1?

UCF vs Kent State Prediction-August 31, 2023

Florida vs Utah Prediction-August 31, 2023

Miami OH vs Miami FL Prediction-August 31, 2023

 

The deal between the Seminole Tribe and the Florida state government allows for other Sportsbook brands in Florida to participate. However, the trick is that those brands must enter into a deal with the Tribe in order to receive access to the sports betting market in Florida.

For example, if BetMGM or DraftKings wanted to offer its members sports betting across Florida with a mobile app, the companies would have to agree to pay the Seminole Tribe a percentage of the revenue earned by the sportsbook in exchange for operating within Florida.

As of August 29, the availability of sports betting across the State of Florida was still up in the air and the countdown has started as the NFL regular season kicks off on September 7th and since NFL betting is the most popular amongst sports bettors, sportsbooks are at risk of losing large sums of money if they cannot launch in time for the opening kickoff.
